message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take this small slice of the pie and we can be done with this.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 4000 is a fair starting point. Let's see if you can do better than that.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob.  Let's end this and split the money fairly.
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away the farm. Take it or leave it.
